title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.54 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 9003.54 - Severability

State Regulations

If any of these rules, or application thereof to any person
or circumstances, is held invalid, the remainder of the rules and application
of such provision to other persons or circumstances shall remain in full force
and effect. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
9003.54

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
